1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: In this brand new comedy game show, noel edmonds opens noel's store for the first time. Contestants try to win £25,000 while manager barry and his staff ensure there's never a dull moment.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Delivery man keith gets caught up in traffic, barry and noel try out a tandem ride, and do a mother and daughter know enough about mini-rolls to win cash?

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: A bird leaves an unwanted deposit in noel's store, noel worries about the takings, and lionelle and her mother hope to pay off her student debt by winning £25,000.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Three toilet seats provide a £2500 conundrum, barry demonstrates his spider catching technique, and wayne sleep calls in to complain.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: One couple risk going solo, keith tries out a new delivery vehicle and there's confusion between some nuns and olly murs.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Kelly shows off her gymnastic skills, keith gets everyone a takeaway and contestant steve gets all emotional over pies.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Bobby davro gets devious with barry. Three dog outfits could be worth thousands. And noel has a problem with swans.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Keith gets stuck in the lift, kelly has a car crash and barry shows off his dad dancing. And can katie and alexis's cheese knowledge win them £25,000?

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: Kelly gets some fire training, two ladies develop a crush on barry, and do pete and rich know enough about magazines to win £25,000?

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: Barry threatens noel with a mallet. Tube drivers get coy over a corset. A couple lose the way over a set of maps. Anthony and ashleigh hope to win £25,000 before their game turns into a dog's dinner.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: There's a musical interlude courtesy of a banjo, some bongos and a man called bert, and keith and noel have a boogie.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: Sisters lillian and liz hope to clean up with their knowledge of feather dusters, and noel gives shop assistant kelly a shoulder to cry on.

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: Barry causes a splash when one couple must choose the cheapest item of swimwear.

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot: Noel's store goes gallic when barry has a french promotion. Vicki michelle makes barry go ooh la la!, as more bargain-spotting contestants set their sights on a £25,000 jackpot.

16.title: Episode #1.16
16.plot: Can carrots help ian and nick find their way to winning big money? Meanwhile, odd job man keith tries his hand at being a cameraman.

17.title: Episode #1.17
17.plot: Have sisters kelly and kirsty bitten off more than they can chew when they have to choose the cheapest edible insects?

18.title: Episode #1.18
18.plot: Cheryl baker pops in to noel's store to make an exchange. And will james and sophia's knowledge of rackets get them through to the final stages of the unique game show?

19.title: Episode #1.19
19.plot: A spoon becomes a £5000 conundrum for one couple, keith hires an apprentice, and kelly has an idea to help noel attract a younger audience.

20.title: Episode #1.20
20.plot: Snooker legend dennis taylor comes in to noel's store to return faulty goods. And can one couple's knowledge of picnic hampers help them carry home big money in the unique game show?

21.title: Episode #1.21
21.plot: Noel welcomes more contestants to the store. Keith takes a busman's holiday, marijana takes fashion inspiration from noel and barry receives a worrying phone call from environmental health.

22.title: Episode #1.22
22.plot: Another visit to the eccentric store. Barry showcases his fancy dress sale with some unlikely models, keith's dodgy diy skills cause chaos, and noel gets a personal trainer.

23.title: Episode #1.23
23.plot: Another visit to noel's eccentric store. One couple hope their knowledge of jeans will help them walk away with thousands, while marijana reveals a hidden talent.

24.title: Episode #1.24
24.plot: Noel edmonds opens the doors to more contestants hoping to win a £25,000 jackpot. Barry's wife margaret has a favour to ask noel, and russell grant comes in to complain about the noise.

25.title: Episode #1.25
25.plot: It's business as usual in the store. Kelly has a beauty emergency, marijana causes heartbreak, and keith invites noel on a lads' night out.

26.title: Episode #1.26
26.plot: Noel's store opens for another day and another game of 'which is the cheapest?'. Marijana plays ball, kelly pulls a fast one, and noel's new shoes get everyone talking.

27.title: Episode #1.27
27.plot: Manager barry goes fishing without leaving the store, three bunches of flowers could be worth £8500, and noel meets himself from the future.

28.title: Episode #1.28
28.plot: Noel edmonds welcomes more bargain hungry contestants to the show. Barry tries his hand at doing noel's job, and there's a breakout of kardashianitis in the store.

29.title: Episode #1.29
29.plot: It's a busy day at the store. Noel and manager barry are run off their feet when the staff go on strike, marijana celebrates a birthday, and noel has a chat with a duck called dave.

30.title: Episode #1.30
30.plot: The doors open for the last time in this series. Noel makes the most of dress-down friday, and when barry is short staffed, the temp agency send lionel blair along to lend a hand.

imdb.title: Cheap cheap cheap
plot: Contestants try to win £25,000 in noel edmonds' general store, while manager barry and others ensure there's never a quiet moment in this craziest of game shows.
